item.description:
Jim M has organized this event. Thanks Jim.

Join your Sitz friends and guests and socialize at an After Work cocktail party. Invite an attractive single friend.

The hotel has generously agreed to let us use their beautiful, glass-lined private event room at the back of the hotel restaurant, The Grille at Hobbs Brook. The restaurant is located just inside the front entrance of the hotel and on the right. Walk through the restaurant to the special room at the back.

Light appetizers will be provided compliments of Sitzundjibers.

A special (private) bar will be set up for us in this back room. If you desire a drink that is not available at this back room, you can obtain it by going out to the main bar, located outside the restaurant and to the right of the restaurant entrance.
item.name: An Afterwork at the Embassy Suites in Waltham
